channel.title: Drunkscape
channel.description:
hi im going to be worikin on a server so i need suggestions....this is what ive done so far its not that much but im workin on it! srythat i have no pics :( 1. fixed barraging ( im using a mixture of sources) 2.shops and a ultimate wepon added. 3. New commands 4. added gfx to lots of areas ( example cities/pk arenas) 5. made admin village 6. made pk box ( it looks sweet) ________________________________________________ things i plan to do 100% working castle wars my own minigames (im still havin errors which i plan to fix) fix all errors working specials and dark bow working client and much more. __________________________________________________________________________________-- please tell me programs to help me do it. i have gennoraters but there sorta useless and its easy to add that stuff -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Programs needed: class editor java editor cache packer decompiler and other programs that can help me edit servers thanks qazws
:D :D :D :D :D ______________________________--------------------------------------_______________________________ Suggestions [quote="Waffles!!"]Idea: Make it so you're always drunk. Name is Drunkscape.[/quote]

item.title: Drunkscape
item.dc:creator: @qazws qazws
item.description:
@qazws wrote:

hi im going to be worikin on a server so i need suggestions…this is what ive done so far
its not that much but im workin on it! srythat i have no pics
1. fixed barraging ( im using a mixture of sources)
2.shops and a ultimate wepon added.
3. New commands
4. added gfx to lots of areas ( example cities/pk arenas)
5. made admin village
6. made pk box ( it looks sweet)
________________________________________________
things i plan to do
100% working castle wars
my own minigames (im still havin errors which i plan to fix)
fix all errors
working specials and dark bow
working client
and much more.
__________________________________________________________________________________–
please tell me programs to help me do it. i have gennoraters but there sorta useless and its easy to add that stuff

                                                      Programs needed:
                                                      class editor
                                                      java editor
                                                      cache packer
                                                     decompiler
                                                    and other programs that can help me edit servers
                                         thanks
                                                   qazws

                                          :D :D :D :D :D
